channel.title: Interpretability on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Interpretability on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Mixture of Experts Made Intrinsically Interpretable
item.description: MoE-X: An intrinsically interpretable Mixture-of-Experts language model that uses sparse, wide networks to enhance transparency.

item.title: LLM-Microscope: Uncovering the Hidden Role of Punctuation in Context Memory of Transformers
item.description: LLMs use punctuation in context memory, surprisingly boosting performance by using seemingly trivial tokens.
